 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֵּ֫שַׁע‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּשְׁעָה‎</span><sub>58</sub> **noun masculine and feminine** ==a nine, nonad== (Late Hebrew = Biblical Hebrew; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***tišit***</u></abbr> (feminine), ***nine***, <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***tešû***</u></abbr>, ***ninth***; Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תסעת‎</span> ***nine***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תסעי‎</span> ***ninety*** [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup>Chr 48</sup>; Lihyanian <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תסע‎</span> [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>Ep. Denkm. Ar. 52</sup>, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תְּשַׁע‎</span> <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Nabataean, Palmyrene <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תשע‎</span> [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>388</sup>, Mandean (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span>; sometimes <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> prefixed) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תשא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עשתא‎</span> [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>M 188</sup>, all ***nine***); — 

**masculine** with **feminine noun** absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֵּ֫שַׁע‎</span> [[Deut.3.11|Deut 3:11]] + 20 t., construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּשַׁע‎</span> [[Judg.4.3|Judg 4:3]] + 18 t.; **feminine** with **masculine noun** absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּשְׁעָה‎</span> [[2Sam.14.8|2Sam 14:8]] + 13 t., construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּשְׁעַת‎</span> [[Josh.13.7|Josh 13:7]] + 2 t. (these include 9 + 10 = 19); — ***nine*** (Hexateuch chiefly [[BDB#P|P]]); 

**1.** no other number: 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** before plural noun <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֵּשַׁע אַמּוֺת‎</span> [[Deut.3.11|Deut 3:11]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁנִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span> [[2Kgs.17.1|2Kgs 17:1]]; [[Gen.11.19|Gen 11:19]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַיָּדוֺת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span> [[Neh.11.1|Neh 11:1]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֳדָשִׁים‎</span> [[2Sam.24.8|2Sam 24:8]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּשְּׁבָטִים‎</span> [[Josh.13.7|Josh 13:7]] ([[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]?), compare [[Josh.14.2|Josh 14:2]]; [[Num.34.13|Num 34:13]] (both [[BDB#P|P]]); after plural noun <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָרִים תֵּ֫שַׁע‎</span> [[Josh.15.44|Josh 15:44]]; [[Josh.15.51|Josh 15:51]]; [[Josh.21.16|Josh 21:16]] (all [[BDB#P|P]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּרִים תִּשְׁעָה‎</span> [[Num.29.26|Num 29:26]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); noun omitted [[1Chr.3.8|1Chr 3:8]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** = ordinal <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַחֹדֶשׁ‎</span> [[2Kgs.25.3|2Kgs 25:3]] + 3 t. ***on the ninth*** (day) ***of the month***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁנַתתֵּֿשַׁע לְ‎</span> [[2Kgs.18.10|2Kgs 18:10]] ***the ninth year of.*** 

**2.** 9 + 10 = 19, with **feminine noun** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּשַׁעעֶֿשְׂרֵה שָׁנָה‎</span> [[Gen.11.25|Gen 11:25]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָרִים תְּשַׁעֿ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶשְׂרֵה‎</span>[[Josh.19.38|Josh 19:38]] (both [[BDB#P|P]]), as ordinal <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׁנַת תְּשַׁעֿ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֶשְׂרִים שָׁנָה לְ‎</span> [[2Kgs.25.8|2Kgs 25:8]] \|\| [[Jer.52.12|Jer 52:12]] with **masculine noun** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּשְׁעָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָשָׂר אִישׁ‎</span> [[2Sam.2.30|2Sam 2:30]], compare (as ordinal, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גּוֺרָל‎</span> omitted) [[1Chr.24.16|1Chr 24:16]]; [[1Chr.25.26|1Chr 25:26]]. 

**3.** 900 = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְשַׁע מֵאוֺת‎</span> [[Judg.4.3|Judg 4:3]] + 14 t. 

**4.** with tens (20, 30, etc.): <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span> following [[2Kgs.14.2|2Kgs 14:2]] + 10 t., precedes [[Gen.11.24|Gen 11:24]] + 6 t., compare [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>ii. 1. 215 ff</sup>.
